where is the urf? riot??? ffs waiting too long
honestly riot wtf are you thinking with this thornmail change are you fucking stupid
is it possible that riot will return manna potions
still no urf, ffs riot...

Riot, please for the love of god listen to your community nearly all of us want ARURF, URF Or One For All. You keep releasing poro king and all the other game modes that not many people like playing make thoes 3 game modes more frequent please.
OK please make chest easier to get i have 5 keys and 0 chest so please make there some other way 2 get chest
Good update, but the Ancient Coin change won't really have much of an effect on low Bronze...
you better not nerf Janna in future patches because coin gives everyone her passive. do not kill my main.

mainly ok with this patch as a whole so far but a little disappointed that the ranged attack bugs are still present ( any ranged champion using a basic attack the animation will play the projectile will fly, hit the target particles will play with sound and no damage is dealt, seriously annoying as an adc player screws up last hitting aswell as your ability to attack space or chase effeciently)
So no urf?
Why not release urf or one for all, riot always develop these unpopular game modes.
*has dark star for two weeks for release which is reasonable... then releases it again for 8 days before urf even comes out*
Can we please get a proper rotation of game modes going. Just go around in a circle so they each get a turn, need my urf and dominion fixes please instead of PK and Dark star rotations.

Those {{champion:131}} buffs are sick! I can finally build
{{item:3025}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3110}} and not get reported! WOO
So Janna's would usually have 16% movement speed for allies moving towards her? That's a free one and a half ludens.
That Fiora nerf is a little harsh, sure she was pretty overpowered but she has her respective counters, one of the two nerfs would of been fine...

{{champion:114}} nerf is a joke, her vital are already soo cluncky and the whole, giving her opponent space to outplay is bs hug a wall and you've denied her 1/4 of her damage. this movementspeed nerf should be followed with increase healing or increase % health or something.
